resume.name: Piero Sansossio
resume.profile: Frontend Developer with 4 years of experience dedicated to creating scalable, interactive web applications with a solid architecture. My primary focus is on code refactoring and legacy system migration to guarantee production quality and long-term performance.
resume.profileSummary: I seek challenging opportunities where my architectural expertise and drive for continuous improvement can generate a significant impact on product stability and success.

education.institution: Jose Antonio Paez University, Valencia, Venezuela
education.description: My knowledge is built on a unique combination of formal education and specialized self-learning. I have developed a comprehensive understanding of application architecture and performance optimization through my university education, complemented by advanced studies in React.js and Redux Toolkit. My technical skills in high-demand areas like TypeScript, WebSockets, and Testing have been greatly enhanced by continuous, hands-on self-education through platforms such as Platzi, Coursera, and YouTube.
